Race.SpecificTitle: PW Regional Military Museum -- .5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Regional Military Museum)

Summary:  Authority to levy a 10 year 0.5 mill property tax for the purpose of improving, maintaining, acquiring, constructing and operating the regional military museum, and Veterans Memorial Park on Louisiana Highway 311, in the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana.
Race.FullText: Shall the Terrebonne Parish Veterans' Memorial District (the "District"), levy a one-half of one (0.5) mill tax on all the property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020 (an estimated $360,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of improving, maintaining, acquiring, constructing, furnishing and operating a regional military museum, and the Veterans Memorial Park on Louisiana Highway 311, in the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation District No. 2, 3 -- 5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Recreation District No. 2, 3 Proposition
(Millage)

Summary:  Authority for Recreation District No. 2, 3 to levy a 10-year 5-mill property tax for constructing, improving, maintaining and operating recreation facilities for said District, including the purchase of equipment therefor, said tax to be in lieu of the similar 5 mills tax authorized at a special election held on May 4, 2002.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 2, 3 of the Parish of Terrebonne, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy and collect a special tax of five (5.00) mills on all property subject to taxation in said District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020 (an estimated $649,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating recreation facilities for said District, including the purchase of equipment therefor, said tax to be in lieu of the similar 5 mills tax authorized at a special election held on May 4, 2002?
